title: Kate's Calling
description: Kate Roland is a private in the U.S. Army and is paired with her longtime friend Dave Fraley,to battle the undead. They find the bodies of a couple, and a journal that they had left behind as well as discovering that a six year old girl had been abandoned in the home, and had been hiding from the infected. Strange dreams and coinciding events lead Kate to believe that the girl is the key to the survival of the human race. Feeling trapped as well, it seems that luck has smiled upon them when they are rescued from the home by a group searching for other survivors. That is how they meet Kimmy, a seven year old terror that continually torments and abuses others; her meanness rivaling that of the Devil himself. Join Kate on her journey to survive and discover a solution the will end the disease that plagues the United States.
author: Julie Cooper Brown
